item.description: Pugs get to dress up. You can too, if you like. I would like people to bring something to eat or drink.. cookies, donuts, anything... or something to drink. If anyone is interested in coming over early to help me set up please email me.. nhpugsrus@aol.com We will have it at my house at 39 Maurice Street. ...

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Halloween Party - Parade
